manifest.title: Formbricks
manifest.author: Formbricks
manifest.description:
### About

Formbricks provides a free and open source surveying platform. Gather feedback at every point in the user journey with beautiful in-app, website, link and email surveys. Build on top of Formbricks or leverage prebuilt data analysis capabilities.

### Features

* Create conversion-optimized surveys with our no-code editor with several question types.
* Choose from a variety of best-practice templates.
* Launch and target your surveys to specific user groups without changing your application code.
* Create shareable link surveys.
* Invite your organization members to collaborate on your surveys.
* Integrate Formbricks with Slack, Notion, Zapier, n8n and more.
manifest.changelog:
* Update formbricks to 3.5.0
* [Full Changelog](https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/releases/tag/v3.5.0)
* fix: Android build fixes by [@​vaxi87](https://github.com/vaxi87) in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4984
* feat: add custom TTL for cache records by [@​victorvhs017](https://github.com/victorvhs017) in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4912
* feat: added qr code feature by [@​Paribesh01](https://github.com/Paribesh01) in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4951
* fix(helm-chart): missing envFrom when using secret.enabled by [@​d3vb0ox](https://github.com/d3vb0ox) in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4992
* fix: handling invalid csv files by [@​pandeymangg](https://github.com/pandeymangg) in https://github.com/formbricks/formbricks/pull/4991
